item.title: 中国针对农产品和国防企业回击特朗普
item.description: 作为对特朗普政府新征税的报复，中国对美国出口产品征收高达 15%的关税，使世界两大经济体之间的贸易战升级。【原文：China imposed tariffs as high as 15% on US exports in retaliation for the Trump administration’s new levy, escalating a trade war between the world’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 特朗普对加拿大、墨西哥和中国征收关税引发贸易战深化
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统兑现了对加拿大和墨西哥全面征收进口关税的威胁，这是自 20 世纪 30 年代以来美国增加关税幅度最大的一次，贸易战的戏剧性升级将颠覆美国与主要经济伙伴的关系。【原文：President Donald Trump delivered on his threat to hit Canada and Mexico with sweeping import levies, imposing one of the largest increases in US tariffs since the 1930s in a dramatic escalation of a trade war that stands to upend ties with major economic partners.】

item.title: 金丝雀码头的阴霾只是重生的悸动
item.description:
如果伦敦东金融区生命科学集群的发展能够说明问题，那么对该区的讣告可能又为时过早。【原文：

Obituaries for the east London financial district may be premature once again, if the growth of its life-sciences cluster is any indicator.

】

item.title: 不可能的 70 亿英镑巨头正在占领英国汽车市场
item.description:
去年，英国销售的每五辆新车中就有一辆是由移动性公司购买的。然而，它的存在只是为了服务于一类非常特殊的客户：申请移动福利的人。【原文：

Motability bought one of every five new cars sold in the UK last year. And yet it only exists to serve a very specific type of customer: people claiming mobility benefits.

】

item.description:

item.description:

item.title: BlueCrest 从英国石油公司（BP）聘请投资组合经理，推动大宗商品发展
item.description: 据熟悉此举的人士透露，BlueCrest Capital Management 已聘请 Kory Lim 担任高级投资组合经理，该对冲基金希望扩大其在亚洲的大宗商品交易覆盖范围。【原文：BlueCrest Capital Management has hired Kory Lim as a senior portfolio manager, as the hedge fund looks to expand its trading coverage of commodities in Asia, according to people familiar with the move.】

item.title: 南非内阁已向戈东瓦纳提出预算方案
item.description: 南非总统府表示，南非内阁已完成为年度预算提供意见的程序，财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳将于 3 月 12 日向立法者提交该预算。【原文：South Africa’s cabinet concluded a process of providing input for the annual budget, which Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana will present to lawmakers on March 12, the presidency said.】

item.title: 特朗普关税之后，中国将对美国商品征收关税
外资撤离，印度股市面临历史性连跌
item.description: 在海外投资者的持续抛售下，基准指数将创下连续第 10 个交易日下跌的纪录。【原文：The selloff in Indian equities is approaching another grim milestone, with the benchmark index poised for a record 10th straight day of decline amid continuous selling by overseas investors.】

item.title: 泰国货币政策 "稳健 "足以应对特朗普关税威胁
item.description: 泰国央行一位高级官员表示，泰国央行的货币政策立场 "稳健"，足以应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普最新关税威胁带来的波动。【原文：The Bank of Thailand’s monetary policy stance is “robust” enough to accommodate the volatility that comes from US President Donald Trump’s latest tariff threats, a senior official said, reiterating that the central bank may hold off before easing further.】

item.title: 刺激消费可能使南非经济免于衰退
item.description: 去年，南非可能避免了经济衰退，这得益于第四季度强劲的消费需求，而主要的采矿和制造业部门仍在苦苦挣扎。【原文：South Africa probably avoided a recession last year, saved by strong consumer demand in the fourth quarter as the key mining and manufacturing sectors continued to struggle.】

item.title: 特朗普用操纵言论为中国人民银行划定货币红线
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对中国货币政策的评论加强了中国央行坚持保持人民币稳定策略的理由。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s comment on China’s currency policy is strengthening the case for the central bank to stick to its strategy of keeping the yuan stable.】

item.title: 腾讯人工智能机器人超越 DeepSeek，成为中国用户在 iPhone 上的最爱
item.description: 本周，腾讯控股有限公司的元宝人工智能聊天机器人超越 DeepSeek，成为中国下载量最高的 iPhone 应用，凸显了国内竞争的加剧。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd.’s Yuanbao AI chatbot passed DeepSeek to become the most downloaded iPhone app in China this week, highlighting the intensifying domestic competition.】

item.title: 空中客车公司就澳大利亚依赖中国燃料问题发出警告
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）警告说，澳大利亚已经过度依赖中国的航空燃料供应，呼吁政府在堪培拉与中国政府关系日益紧张的情况下启动国内生产。【原文：Airbus SE warned that Australia has become overly reliant on Chinese supplies of aviation fuel, calling on the government to kickstart domestic production amid increased tension between Canberra and Beijing.】

item.title: 越南基金寻求开发价值 15 亿美元的数据中心枢纽
item.description: 西贡资产管理公司（Saigon Asset Management）在一份新闻稿中说，该公司寻求在越南南部开发一个数据中心枢纽，预计投资额高达 15 亿美元。【原文：Saigon Asset Management seeks to develop a data center hub in southern Vietnam with an estimated investment of as much as $1.5 billion, it said in a release.】

item.title: 台湾部长称对台积电美国化的担忧过于夸张
item.description: 台湾政府淡化了对台湾半导体制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan’s government downplayed concerns that Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s plans to invest a further $100 billion in the US will effectively lead to the chip-making giant becoming Americanized.】

item.title: 尽管特朗普加征关税，富士康大型人工智能工厂仍在一年内准备就绪
item.description: 哈利斯科州州长巴勃罗-莱穆斯-纳瓦罗（Pablo Lemus Navarro）表示，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对富士康征收新关税，但富士康计划在墨西哥瓜达拉哈拉（Guadalajara）附近建造的超大型人工智能（AI）服务器工厂将在一年内竣工。【原文：Foxconn’s planned mega-AI server plant near Guadalajara, Mexico, will complete construction in a year despite the threat of new tariffs from President Donald Trump, according to Jalisco Governor Pablo Lemus Navarro.】

item.title: 印度股市大跌抹去约 9000 亿美元后，多头看到反弹潜力
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 伊朗利用小型船舶规避对华石油贸易制裁
item.description: 随着非法贸易面临美国制裁的压力越来越大，更小、更灵活的油轮在向中国运输伊朗石油的过程中发挥着越来越重要的作用。【原文：Smaller and more agile tankers are playing an increasingly important role in the transport of Iranian oil to China, as the illicit trade faces mounting pressure from US sanctions.】

item.title: 澳大利亚最高银行家预计降息周期将更慢更短
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦银行首席执行官马特-科明（Matt Comyn）表示，他预计利率下调幅度将小于一些人的预期。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia Chief Executive Officer Matt Comyn said he expects interest rates to be reduced less than what some people are anticipating.】

item.title: 滴滴自动驾驶部门据称将以 50 亿美元的估值寻求融资
item.description: 滴滴全球公司（Didi Global Inc.【原文：Didi Global Inc. is seeking fresh capital for its autonomous driving unit that could value it at about $5 billion, people familiar with the situation said, as Chinese technology firms ride a wave of investor enthusiasm.】

item.title: 安宏寻求约 3 亿美元贷款以收购银科中国
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，收购公司 Advent International 正在寻求约 3 亿美元的等值贷款，以支持其收购隐形眼镜制造商银库国际在中国的业务。【原文：Buyout firm Advent International is seeking an around $300 million equivalent loan to back its purchase of contact lens maker Ginko International’s China operations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国股市下跌，关税现实压倒经济刺激希望
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普签署对中国增加关税的命令后，中国股市下跌，在本周北京举行的关键政治会议前考验着投资者的神经。【原文：Chinese stocks dropped after US President Donald Trump signed an order to increase tariffs on the country, testing investors nerves before a crucial political meeting in Beijing this week.】

item.title: Sycamore 接近收购沃尔格林博姿联盟
item.description: 知情人士透露，Sycamore Partners 即将收购沃尔格林博姿联盟公司（Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc.【原文：Sycamore Partners is nearing an acquisition of Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc., people with knowledge of the matter said, in a deal that could end the drugstore operator’s tumultuous run as a public company.】

item.title: 日本科技股因关税担忧和新加坡芯片调查而下跌
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普预计对加拿大、墨西哥和中国征收关税之前，投资者担心全球贸易战升级，日本科技和芯片相关企业股价下跌。【原文：Shares of Japanese tech and chip-related firms fell as investors braced for an escalation in the global trade war, ahead of Donald Trump’s expected imposition of tariffs on Canada, Mexico and China.】

item.title: Grab 收购马来西亚连锁超市，大力发展杂货业务
item.description: 东南亚打车服务领军企业 Grab 控股有限公司正在收购马来西亚的一家连锁超市，这是该公司在其主要市场之一的杂货业扩张的又一举措。【原文：Southeast Asia ride-hailing leader Grab Holdings Ltd. is buying a chain of supermarkets in Malaysia, adding to its push to expand in groceries in one of its key markets.】

item.title: 香港塔贷款到期在即，Gaw Capital 正在商谈解决贷款问题
item.description: 总部位于香港的投资公司 Gaw Capital Partners 正在与贷款方商讨，为两栋办公楼即将到期的贷款寻找解决方案。【原文：Hong Kong-based investment firm Gaw Capital Partners is in discussions with lenders to find a resolution for a soon-to-mature loan backing two office buildings.】

item.title: 五角大楼否认停止对俄网络行动的报道
item.description: 据一位高级国防官员称，五角大楼否认了媒体关于国防部长皮特-黑格塞斯（Pete Hegseth）下令停止针对俄罗斯的进攻性网络行动的报道。【原文：The Pentagon has denied media reports that Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth had ordered a halt in offensive cyber operations against Russia, according to a senior defense official.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行称降息并不意味着理事会将进一步放宽政策
item.description: 澳大利亚中央银行董事会在四年来首次降息后，对未来的宽松政策表示谨慎，2 月份的会议记录显示，该董事会担心快速的举措可能会危及通胀率重返 2.5% 的目标中点。【原文：Australia’s central bank board expressed caution about future policy easing after cutting interest rates for the first time in four years, minutes of its February meeting showed, worrying that rapid moves could jeopardize inflation’s return to the 2.5% midpoint of its target.】
